name: fingerprint-oss-test

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: cd unit && npm install && npm test
scripts.test:e2e: cd e2e && npm install && npm test
scripts.install:all: cd unit && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install

description: This project contains tests for fingerprint-oss
author: Akshat Kotpalliwar
